== Exercise: Write Robotium tests
=== Exercise: Writing Robotium tests
Create an Android project called _com.vogella.android.test.robotium.target_ . Display three buttons in the first activity. If the first button is pressed, start another activity which displays a list.
=== Create test project and add Robotium
Create a test project called _com.vogella.android.test.robotium.targetTest_ . Create a folder called `libs` and place the Robotium `JAR` file into it.
If you place the `JAR` file in this folder, the Android tooling for Eclipse adds it automatically to the build path of your project. Putting the `JAR` into a folder with a different name, frequently causes a `ClassNotFoundExeception` for the Solo class.
